I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get the present weather for any city. Use format weather: city name 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 6. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 7. I can set a timer for you. Enter 'set a timer: minutes to timer' 
 8. I can get the present Covid stats for any country. Use 'covid 19: world' or 'covid 19: country name' 
 For suggestions to help me improve, send an email to ted.thedlbot.suggestions@gmail.com . Thank you!!

patterns: I have no one to talk to
My friends do not respond to me
responses: I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling lonely. It's okay to feel this way, and you're not alone in experiencing it.
Sometimes, friends may be busy, but it doesn't mean you're a bad friend. People have different schedules and priorities.
If you want to talk, I'm here for you. Venting your feelings can be a good way to cope with loneliness.
Building and maintaining friendships can be challenging, but it doesn't define your worth as a person.

patterns: How can I make new friends?
I think my friends are avoiding me
responses: It's tough when you feel isolated. Consider reaching out to your friends and expressing your feelings. They might not be aware of what you're going through.
Making new friends can be challenging, but it's never too late. Try engaging in activities you enjoy, and you might meet like-minded people.
Feeling like your friends are avoiding you can be hurtful. Communication is key; have an open and honest conversation with them about how you feel.
Remember, everyone goes through ups and downs in friendships. You're not alone, and things can get better with time.
If you ever need someone to talk to, I'm here for you. Sharing your thoughts can be a positive step toward feeling better.
What two things can you never eat for breakfast?.....Lunch and Dinner!
What word is spelled incorrectly in every single dictionary?.....Incorrectly
How can a girl go 25 days without sleep?.....She sleeps and night!
How do you make the number one disappear?.....Add the letter G and it’s 'gone'!
What will you actually find at the end of every rainbow?.....The letter 'w'
What can be caught but never thrown?.....A cold!
What has a thumb and four fingers but is not actually alive?.....Your Gloves!
What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?.....Short
Why can't a bike stand on it's own?.....It is two-tired.
